Create a new group

create_group.Rd

Create a new group

create_group(type, name, division_id = NULL)

Arguments

type

Group Type. Currently this is a GAP as you cannot create group types with an API nor look them up. But you need that to create a Group.
name

Name of group to be created
division_id

default NULL but specific division id can be specified

Value

id of newly created group

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
